products.title: Stockholm Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. products.title: Stockholm Brittany Blue Roller Blind
products.description: This light brittany blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This light blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.description: Stirlooyster cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.
